title: Video: Hypnolove – Holiday Reverie
body:
[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/07/205588_164511486935726_134249979961877_317931_240738_n-350x350.jpg "Hypnolove")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/07/205588_164511486935726_134249979961877_317931_240738_n.jpg)

This new video from French trio Hypnolove for new single Holiday Reverie, has to be one of the funniest, yet most bizarre visual creations of the year thus far. Appearing to take influence from those dreadful, obscure holiday advertising videos shown late at night, there’s plenty of beautiful women, idyllic beaches and 80’s inspired work out shots. The track itself is a summer gem, gloriously upbeat and insanely catchy, with plenty of synths and bass to boost the overall sunshine drenched vibe. Check out Holiday Reverie below.
